mapper.insert:
SELECT RECRUIT_BOARD_SQE.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO RECRUIT_BOARD ( r_idx,member_name,type_pc, title,teamname,cont,hit,writedate, sido,ch_pattern,ch_start,ch_end ) VALUES( #{r_idx}, 'admin', #{type_pc}, #{title},#{teamname}, #{cont},0,sysdate,#{sido},#{ch_pattern},#{ch_start},#{ch_end})
